# 𒌤 UMUM×KASKAL 𒌣 𒆜

𒌤 #šapāku shape 𓆣

𒌤 ≈ 𒌥

𒌤 ᵏmum ⇔ 𓏠 ?

𒌤 de₂ da₉ daʳ ذَرَّى ḏarrā tear trennen √dar = give "to pour; to winnow"

𒌤 de₂ da₉ < ta in 𒌋𒅗𒌤 u.ku.da₉ اِخْتَفَى iḵtafā "disappear"

𒌤 de₂ dim6 ≈ 𒌣 da₉ ≈ 𒁆 dimx dumm?

𒌤𒄭 de-hi 𒁾 dehi tax

𒌤 #šapāku separate 𓀆 𓃂 pour

𒌤 da9 daʳ stir #marāsu "to mix"

𒌤 dim6 ≈ 𒌣 ≈ 𒁆 dimx dimma 𒁆𒈠 dumme? Lämmer takmīsu

𒂊𒈬 ᵏe-mu חָם khám ʱe-mu حَم ḥam חמא
𒂊𒌤 ᵏe-mum γάμος gámos ⇔ Heim®-Vater
𒂊𒌤 father-in-law ⇔ com commune comrade ⇔ חָם khám rabi

𒌤𒈬 mum-mu ⇔ common mammal?

𒌤𒈠𒊑𒌅 mum-ma-ri-tu
𒌤𒈠𒊑𒌅 a weapon or tool, common … mariant?

𒀀𒌤 a-de2 𒀀𒌤𒀀 a-de2-a "flood, flood season, flooding" √water
𒀉𒌤 a de2 "to irrigate (by flooding)" Akk. šaqû ša eqli
